Text: fxg plzz upload the last song starring miley cyrus

sound is +100ms off sync. use k twice with vlc to adjust.

v/a = 9/9

generally, sync issues drive me insane....i can't ignore them. This one though, isn't too bad....There IS a bit of a problem, but it (probably) won't be too terribly distracting for most people. Shame it isn't perfect, but it's close.

 Quality otherwise is what you would expect from FxG. A/V/Subs....All good.

Thx guys - much appreciated.

Good movie.
Perfect Quality thanks fxg
@scare_crow just open the video using vlc and click extended settings, it is located below just beside the full screen and show playlist button, then select synchronization..

A=6, V=7, M=4
audio sync is off throughout

adjust the sound on 150ms, press K three times in VLC.

V8 S6.5
